DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose was to evaluate the efficacy of SKP FlutiForm HFA MDI compared to placebo or fluticasone and formoterol administered concurrently or alone in asthma patients.
DOC.brief_title: Single-dose Crossover Study to Compare the Safety and Efficacy of FlutiForm With Fluticasone and Formoterol Concurrently or Alone in Asthma Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects with documented history of mild to moderate asthma currently taking a stable dose of inhaled corticosteroid Smoking history within the last 12 months No history of respiratory tract infection within 4 weeks No history or evidence of any clinically significant disease or abnormality
